front.title: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Event Package for OMA Content Push Delivery

abstract.t: This document specifies a new event package for OMA Push-based service over SIP. The purpose is to allow an OMA application or a UA to subscribe to updates to its own OMA application events containing either content or references to the content. This document further describes how content can be pushed out to an application by the use of OMA Push-based events.
